In the Maximal base, Blackfang was reviewing the report on the 
intervention he had to go through. With such heavy damages to 
essential circuits, he started wondering how he managed not to hurt 
anyone.

At the same moment, he saw Ragnar's towering form enter the lounge he 
was in.

Ragnar: So, guys, this is the lounge, from what I make of the map. 
Your personnal quarters are on the right.

Blackfang: There is also an energon distributor at the end of the left 
hallway.

Ragnar turned at Blackfang and studied him. He was an ugly looking 
bot, but he also had a sense of nobility emanating from him. He 
reminded him a bit of Trent, the Smoke Jaguar Mechwarrior who betrayed 
his Clan because of his convictions.

Ragnar: You are Blackfang, quiaff?

Blackfang: Yeah, that's me. Ragnar, right? And who are your friends?

Ragnar: This is Windlord and Aerotaur. They are new warriors here. (He 
stopped a moment) Perhaps you can help me. I have been here only for a 
short time, and since I am not of Robotic origins, I know not what we 
fight for. Maybe you can brief me, quiaff?

Blackfang grinned: Why not? Alright, we are maximals. Our main enemies 
here are the Predacons, who're some kind of criminals here. Their boss 
has a notoriety for dangerous scheming. However, there are some other 
groups that just popped up since we came here. We may have to deal 
with'em too.

Ragnar: I thank you, Blackfang.
